title: ΑΘΗΝΑΖΕ
description: This is a test run of Athenaze for Greek text

words.gloss: used to indicate a quotation or passage from another source
to lift or to take up
to be quiet or to keep silent
to understood or grasp a concept
to be angry or to be indignant
to make a mistake; to err
to intend or to be about to do something

content.subtitle: Ο ΔΟΥΛΟΣ ΤΟΝ ΚΥΝΑ ΟΥ ΦΙΛΕΙ
